title: Victoria's Favourite Things. Segment 2
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Social life and customs
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
abstract: Meaningful rings, footy fans, friends, Elephant, Edward Bear and wiggly ears
description: The results of July 2004's Open House weekend program 'Victoria's Favourite Things'. This segment features Annemaree and Doug from Hawthorn telling us about the significance of her rings and his passion for AFL Footy; Emily, John and Raj talk about 'favourite friends'; Kate from Elwood tells us about Elephant; Christy from Elwood loves her Edward B. Bear and Anthony shows us his favourite party trick
